title: mallikai mAlai
sahitya:
mallaikai mAlai aNindirundAn mAyan malarnda ennai avan marandirundAn


anupallavi

  sollavE muDiyAda shOdanai pala sheidE meLLa arugi vandE mEni tannai aNaindAn


caraNam    vil enavE puruvam tITTi vandEnE vizhigaLilE kayalai viLaiyADa vaittEnE
sadangaiyuDan konjum vaLaigaL aNindEnE sallApam inriye nAn vADinEn
